etomica.space

Interface IVectorRandom

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IVector, IVectorMutable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Vector1D, Vector2D, Vector3D, VectorND

    public interface IVectorRandom
extends IVectorMutable
    Vector interface for vectors having random number methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setRandomCube(IRandom random)
      Assigns each component to (its own) random value between -0.5 and + 0.5.
      void setRandomInSphere(IRandom random)
      Assigns this vector to equal a point chosen randomly in the volume of a unit spheres.
      void setRandomSphere(IRandom random)
      Assigns this vector to equal a point chosen randomly on the surface of a unit sphere.

      • Methods inherited from interface etomica.api.IVectorMutable

        DE, E, E, E, Ea1Tv1, Ev1Mv2, Ev1Pv2, map, ME, mod, normalize, PE, PE, PEa1Tv1, setX, TE, TE, XE

      • Methods inherited from interface etomica.api.IVector

        assignTo, dot, equals, getD, getX, isNaN, isZero, Mv1Squared, squared

    • Method Detail

      • setRandomSphere

        void setRandomSphere(IRandom random)
        Assigns this vector to equal a point chosen randomly on the surface of a unit sphere.

      • setRandomCube

        void setRandomCube(IRandom random)
